predicate.note: Frames file for 'export' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'send'.

example.name: active, missing importer
example.text: Westmoreland exports about a fourth of its coal tonnage, including a significant amount of metallurgical coal produced by others that is used by steelmakers overseas.

example.name: passive, missing exporter
